sentences.english: But in the end, Yang's laughs will surely drown out those of his keyboard warrior critics.
sentences.chinese: 但是在最后，孙杨的笑容势必会盖过键盘侠们的口水。

sentences.english: Feng's high-profile in entertainment industry is bound to bring into broad controversy.
sentences.chinese: 凤姐此次高调进军演艺界势必会带来争议。

sentences.english: Paint-free door will become the first choice majority of home users.
sentences.chinese: 免漆门势必成为广泛居日用户的首位挑选。

sentences.english: Eleven long-distance travel a large number of households is bound to divert Golden Week tourists showings.
sentences.chinese: 大量家庭十一长途出游，势必分流黄金周看房客源。

sentences.english: To break them will definitely unleash enormous driving force for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 如果突破这些瓶颈，势必会释放巨大的经济驱动力。

sentences.english: The site is on the way to breaking last year's record totals.
sentences.chinese: 中国网球网势必将突破去年记录，再创新高。

sentences.english: So long as we work together we can achieve great results.
sentences.chinese: 只要我们一起努力势必能达到好的结果。

sentences.english: And one will definitely be charmed by giant plush cucumbers.
sentences.chinese: 相信每一个人都势必会被那个巨大的毛绒黄瓜吸引住。

sentences.english: The stability of the economy and society would surely be affected, leaving people haunted.
sentences.chinese: 轮番提价势必影响经济和社会稳定，搞得人心惶惶。

sentences.english: Oil should remain excessively volatile as the situation unwinds in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 从北非情况来看，原油势必继续极端震荡。

sentences.english: So Bouguer correction must cause much errors.
sentences.chinese: 因此，布格改正势必造成相当大的误差。

sentences.english: Han imperial power and the enhanced powers of the decision of the Imperial College is bound to decline.
sentences.chinese: 皇权及大族权力的增强决定了太学势必衰落的命运。

sentences.english: The answer, increasingly, seems to be that they'll have to strike out on their own.
sentences.chinese: 看起来他们势必将会自己三振出局。

sentences.english: Raising price again and again should affect economy and social stability, and make people nervous.
sentences.chinese: 轮番提价势必影响经济和社会稳定，搞得人心惶惶。

sentences.english: When the demand outnumbers the supply in the job market, there will come another high tide of unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 在僧多粥少的环境下，势必再出现另一波失业潮。

sentences.english: If you go on like this, you'll make big mistakes some day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你继续这样下去势必有一天要犯大错误。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
